```{=html}
<h3>Opposites ≠ Negations </h3>

<p><strong>Statement:</strong> sugar is <i>bad</i> for you </p>
<p><strong>Opposite:</strong> sugar is <i>great</i> for you </p>

<br>

<div class="fragment fade-left">
    <p><strong>First Negation:</strong> sugar is <i>not bad</i> for you </p>
    <p><strong>Second Negation:</strong> sugar is <i>not great</i> for you </p>
</div>

<br>
<div class="fragment fade-up">
    <small>The negation is more broad, while the opposite is often "polarising"</small>
</div>
```
